publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7876 Kenny MacAskill: The Advice and Assistance and Civil Legal Aid (Financial Conditions and Contributions) (Scotland) Regulations 2011—That the Justice Committee recommends that the Advice and Assistance and Civil Legal Aid (Financial Conditions and Contributions) (Scotland) Regulations 2011 be approved. Supported by: Fergus Ewing*
